```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

data("instacart")
```

The data will be presented here is the "instacart" data.

```{r}
instacart = 
  instacart %>% 
  select(product_name, aisle, department) 
```

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  count(aisle) %>% 
  filter(n > 10000) %>% 
  mutate(
    aisle = factor(aisle),
    aisle = fct_reorder(aisle,n)
  ) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    y = ~n, x = ~aisle, color = ~aisle, 
    type = "bar", colors = "viridis"
  )

```
